video_identification.title: Gaza Genocide: Personal Experience in the Context of Decolonizing the Palestinian Mind - Haidar Eid

extracted_metadata.title: Gaza Genocide: Personal Experience in the Context of Decolonizing the Palestinian Mind - Haidar Eid
extracted_metadata.description: Guest speaker Prof. Haidar Eid. "The Gaza Genocide: Personal Experience in the Context of Decolonizing the Palestinian Mind." Wednesday, March 20th, 2024 Prof. Haidar Eid is an Associate Professor of Postcolonial and Postmodern Literature at Gaza's al-Aqsa University. He is a survivor of the Gaza genocide and has written extensively on the Palestinian question. His latest book is titled "Decolonising the Palestinian Mind."
